General.Name: Hengsheng Energy Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Hengsheng Energy Co., Ltd engages in coal-fired thermal power business in China. It also produces and supplies electric power and heat; steam and hot water; and engages in thermal power generation. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Longyou Hengsheng Heating Co., Ltd. Hengsheng Energy Co., Ltd was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Quzhou, China.
